We proposed the Turbo-Relaying Protocol (TRP) to increase each nodes throughput of upstream transmission in tree topologies. We showed that our approach can achieve up to 100% throughput gain over the basic multihop hop-by-hop transmission, for any regular tree with any connectivity degree.
